column4: Raduszyn [raˈduʂɨn] is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Murowana Goślina
column7: in west-central Poland.[1] It lies immediately to the west of the town of Murowana Goślina
column8: approximately 3 kilometres (2 mi) west of the town centre
column9: and 21 km (13 mi) north of the regional capital Poznań. In 2006 the village had a population of 280.
